summary: A man caught in the middle of two simultaneous robberies at the same bank desperately tries to protect the teller with whom he's secretly in love.
cast: Patrick Dempsey|Ashley Judd|Tim Blake Nelson|Mekhi Phifer|Matt Ryan|Jeffrey Tambor|John Ventimiglia|Pruitt Taylor Vince|Curtis Armstrong|Rob Huebel|Adrian Martinez|Natalia Safran|Octavia Spencer|Eddie Matthews|Rob Boltin|James DuMont|Judy Durning|Joseph Nemmers|Victor Eli Hugo|Raymond Rivera|Crystal Kung|Tamara Birkemoe|Monica Acosta|Chris Angerdina|Beau Brasseaux|Ashley Braud|Thomas C. Daniel|Kasey Emas|Amber Gaiennie|Ashley Elizabeth Hebert
title: Atraco por duplicado
